definition.text: Now you're ready to push your new profile to the main Superalgos repository!

paragraphs.text:
Hit Ctrl + Shift + Alt + Key-S to save your profile if you haven't yet.

Now, set up you Github API credentials to get ready to contribute your profile!

If you don't know what I'm talking about, you may need a refresher on how to submit a contribution to Superalgos. Read these few steps taken from the Beyond the Basics Tutorial to remind you what the GitHub authentication process is like.
